sentences.en: A whole package of side glass puts the frame, artistic does not seep.
sentences.cn: 整体包边玻璃搁架, 美观不渗漏.

sentences.en: Blood was beginning to seep through the bandages.
sentences.cn: 血开始从绷带上渗出来。

sentences.en: Cold seep and cold seep carbonates are the frontiers in the modern science.
sentences.cn: 冷泉及冷泉碳酸盐岩是当今科学界研究的前沿之一.

sentences.en: Expectations are high - oil has long been known to seep onshore.
sentences.cn: 预期是很高的 - 很久以来岸上都能看到渗出的油.

sentences.en: If meteoric water does not evaporate or run overland, it may seep directly into the ground.
sentences.cn: 如果雨水不从陆地蒸发和流走的话, 就可能直接渗入地下.

sentences.en: Instead, it conjures up a deadly poison that seems to seep out of the flowers.
sentences.cn: 反之, 这幅画在人们的思绪唤起一种致命的毒药,毒汁似乎就要从花中渗出.

sentences.en: Little information is being made available; what does seep out seems to change every day.
sentences.cn: 找不到什么有效的信息, 那些小道消息似乎每天都不一样.

sentences.en: My anger began to seep away.
sentences.cn: 我的怒火开始消下去了.

sentences.en: Radioactive water had seeped into underground reservoirs.
sentences.cn: 放射性水已渗入了地下蓄水池。

sentences.en: Sewage lines may break, and sewage may seep into water supplies.
sentences.cn: 下水道可能破裂, 然后污水可能渗进供水系统.

sentences.en: Slowly, droplets of you seep in through the night's soft the caress.
sentences.cn: 轻柔的, 你化作水滴渗入黑夜的爱抚.

sentences.en: The iconic reef is being damaged by pesticides and sediment from farms that seep into waterways.
sentences.cn: 农业生产中各种杀虫剂和废渣都流入海水当中,大堡礁因此受到破坏.

sentences.en: The impact can seep through the economy, affecting everything from industrial production to credit cards.
sentences.cn: 该影响渗透到经济的各个方面--从货物到信用卡.

sentences.en: These eyes that look asas dry wells, Despite the glue they seep, once keenly shone.
sentences.cn: 这双眼睛已干如枯井, 尽管还剩下几滴粘液流淌,但从前他们却曾锐利闪亮.

sentences.en: To drain or seep through a porous material or filter.
sentences.cn: X射线能够透过某些固体物质.

sentences.en: When fear overcomes our minds, it begins to seep into our actions.
sentences.cn: 当恐惧战胜了我们的理智, 它就开始渗入到我们的行动中.
